executable.title: Minimal Path Extraction (TubeTK)
executable.description: Extract the minimal path on an image
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: InputImage
image.label: Input Image
image.description: Input image to compute minimal path

file.name: OutputTREFile
file.label: Output TRE File
file.description: Output tubes centered along the path

file.name: InputPathFile
file.label: Input Path File
file.description: Extract path to meet the given path in Input Path File.

boolean.name: DisjoinPath
boolean.label: Disjoin Path
boolean.description: Stop extracting new path as it approach with in the boundary of the input path.

double.name: Distance
double.label: Disjoin Distance
double.description: Distance between new path and input path

file.name: PathEndPoints
file.label: Path End Points File
file.description: Save the end points of the extracted path.

boolean.name: ExtractRadiusUsingInputImage
boolean.label: Extract Radius Using Input Image
boolean.description: Extract tube radius along the path using input image. To be used when input image is a distance map.

double.name: TerminationValue
double.label: Termination Value
double.description: Minimum value to reach before Optimizer is terminated

integer.name: NumberOfIterations
integer.label: Number of Iterations
integer.description: Maximum number of optimizer iterations. Only used with Gradient Descent and Regular Step Gradient Descent optimizers

double.name: StepLengthFactor
double.label: Step Length Factor
double.description: Optimizer Step Size factor. Only used with Iterate Neighborhood and Regular Step Gradient Descent optimizers

double.name: StepLengthRelax
double.label: Step Length Relax
double.description: Set Relaxation Factor. Only used with Regular Step Gradient Descent optimizer
